location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 100 of 1855 from Henry Lacon Anderson, Secretary to the Government, Secret Department, Bombay to Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication from the Resident (No. 3) dated 23 February 1855 concerning the unauthorised fire directed at ships of the Indian Naval Squadron in November 1854; it states that the Bombay Government approves of the Resident's proceedings outlined within.
